javadoc.info

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • javadoc.info.Time

  • public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains the time in 12 hour format.
    Author:
    Steve Jobs, Hugh
    See Also:
    24 hour Time Class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Time()
      This no argument constructor sets each instance variable to zero.
      Time(int hour, int minute, int second)
      Time constructor - argument based.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Time

        public Time()
     throws java.lang.Exception
        This no argument constructor sets each instance variable to zero. This ensures that all time objects start at a constant state.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - which is bad

      • Time

        public Time(int hour,
            int minute,
            int second)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Time constructor - argument based.
        Parameters:
        hour - - the hour 0-23
        minute - - the minute
        second - - the second
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - in the case of a non valid value
